stanza.line: Thy bosom is endeared with all (a)hearts(/a)
Which I by lacking have supposed (b)dead(/b)
And there reigns love and all love's loving (a)parts(/a)
And all those friends which I thought (b)buried(/b)
How many a holy and obsequious (c)tear(/c)
Hath dear religious love stol'n from mine (d)eye(/d)
As interest of the dead which now (c)appear(/c)
But things removed that hidden in thee (d)lie(/d)
Thou art the grave where buried love doth (e)live(/e)
Hung with the trophies of my lovers (f)gone(/f)
Who all their parts of me to thee did (e)give(/e)
That due of many now is thine (f)alone(/f)
Their images I loved I view in (g)thee(/g)
And thou (all they) hast all the all of (g)me(/g)
